:KitKat:;

She woke up and raised her head.  She looked at the box that Drillbit 
was carrying. "Um, Terrorsaur just left to get my leg back.  Let's 
wait and see if it's in good condition or any condition to try to 
reattach it.  If it's not, them I will gladly have you put that leg 
on me." she smiled and stood up.  She walked over to him and licked 
his hand.  she looked up at him and smiled. "Thank you my friend."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit comes running out of his room, with a small cryo box, over 
to
> KitKat.
> "I got it. Here is a perfect replica of you're arm. Want me to start
> attaching it?"
